name: xrm-csv-workflow
description: This repository provides a performant way to convert CSV files to RDF.

scripts.xrm:bootstrap: node lib/duck2xrm.js xrm-csv-workflow.duckdb -s mappings/sources.xrm -v mappings/vocabularies.xrm -m mappings/mappings.xrm
scripts.rdf:create: mkdir -p target & ./bin/ontop/ontop materialize -f ntriples -o ./output/transformed.nt -p xrm-csv-workflow.properties -m src-gen/mappings.r2rml.ttl
